nodes.text: Rule 729900 or Seven Hundred and Twenty-Nine Thousand Nine Hundred was a regulation that the senate of the Galactic Republic used. Subsection B38 of the rule concerned Senate subcommittees. In 24 BBY, it was reviewed by Sano Sauro, the Senator of the planet Eeropha.
Rule 729900 appeared in the young adult novel Jedi Quest: The False Peace, the ninth volume in the Jedi Quest series written by Jude Watson and released in July 2004.
